column4: Any ideas why i am not getting all the files asscoated with the package I am installing?
can you choose the recovery option in grub?
Anyone else in the room, why would have not have to recovery console installed under grub?
the grub menu is hidden by default on single boot systems. you have to press some key to get the menu, is that your question?
not really as he seems to say there is only one option in his grub boot menu unless he is not sure what i mean
